ISSUE.TITLE: wip/iob-cob does not display raw when SGV is a special value
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: During the sensor warmup, iob-cob does not display raw data, even though raw is included in documents containing a special value SGV.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: css adjustments so IOB/COB displays whenin short-landscape mode

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fixed filter so that we still get raw durring ???, fixes #295
